Articles.Content:
After 4 iterations of my airplane labeled the "Giant" (oh the originality), I finally have something I am truly proud of. Meet the Giant MkIV, a 1159 part airplane.

This plane here carries 23260 units of jet fuel that power 16 turbojet engines that have to push 4 fuselages. Everything about this plane was about size. I didn't want to cut corners either, so as you can see I didn't use any mods and I didn't use the aid of SRBs for takeoff.

Unfortunately, due to its size, I can't properly test it. I don't know what the range of it is, or the max speed, or its flight ceiling, or its agility. It's too laggy for me to test. But hey, I got it off the ground, I'm sure it can do more than that. Anyways, here is the download link: http://www./download.php?2k2lxrv7iif3yj2

Let's see how many FPS you can run this plane.

HHHHHHHhhMMMmmmmmmm those wings..................... lets call it the biggest bird in the world.....

how long did it take to get off the ground?
About 91 m/s, so just before it hits the end of the runway. It's not a slow plane.
i mean in minuets due to the lag
Yeah it takes a good minute to finally catch air...

Well, she pulls a bit to the left and it starts to nose down at around 6,000... Made it to 8600 before it leveled out and behaved badly, so I gave it a beating.

It was a fun ride... thanks for the upload

Good to know its flight characteristics; I'll work on that later. I can't fly it that far because of sheer lag, so I can't test it.

Edited May 8, 2013 by anonymousgamer
u all are insane... and how da hell it is possible to make this??

Insane... or ingenious?

Bigger planes must be made!
